description: Gets a xml format representation for vpn device configuration script.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

virtual_network_gateway_connection_name.description: The name of the virtual network gateway connection for which the configuration script is generated.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the generate vpn device script operation.

subscription_id.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

vendor.description: The vendor for the vpn device.

devicefamily.description: The device family for the vpn device.

firmwareversion.description: The firmware version for the vpn device.
